inn1.comm: lots of swing from Zaheer, he bowled it full and wide outside off stump, the ball swung a long way away from Butt who decided to let it go, the umpire didn't call that wide, Zaheer was lucky to get away with it
this time he pitches it closer to off stump and swings it away from the left-hander, Butt once again lets it go through to Dhoni

Butt's away, Zaheer pitched it on leg and middle, trying to swing it across the left-hander and square him up, the length however was too full and Butt neatly clipped it off his pads to the square leg boundary
this time it's far too wide outside off stump for the umpire to let it go, that's the first extra of the day
he over-compensates by drifting on the pads again, Butt helps himself to more easy runs by flicking it behind square
this one kept a little low outside off stump, Butt lets it go through to Dhoni

what a first over for Pakistan, Zaheer drifts on to the pads once again, Butt moves across his stumps and even though he falls over a touch as he flicks, he's timed that superbly and the ball races to the boundary
RP angles the ball across the right-hander and then bends it back in, Akmal defends on the front foot

RP pitches on a good length and swings the ball back into Akmal who tries to flick, he gets beaten by the swing and gets hit flush on the pad, RP appeals for leg before but that was missing leg stump by a long way
Akmal gets off the mark in some style, RP angles the ball wide outside off stump, Akmal gets on to the front foot and crashes the ball through the covers for four more
RP goes back to his straighter line and even though the ball swings back and hits Akmal on the pads once again, it was missing leg stump
on a good length on off and middle stump, Akmal jumps back in his crease and defends
pitches on off stump and jags back into the right-hander from a good length, Akmal plays it off the back foot and drives the ball behind point for  a single to third man
on a good length around off stump, the ball doesn't bend back into the right hander like it left the left-hander, Akmal watches the ball swing away from his bat
this time Akmal chases the ball that pitches on off stump and leaves the right hander, he gets beaten
superb drive, Zaheer over-pitches outside off stump, Akmal moves forward and reaches out for the ball, he connects with the cover drive and no one moves as the ball races to the boundary
Akmal gets on to the front foot and defends to the man at short cover
cut down to third man for a single
Butt leans forward and plays a punchy drive to a fullish delivery from Zaheer, he timed that exquisitely but hit it straight to the fielder
Akmal moves across his stumps and tries to flick a full ball, RP beats him with the in-swing into the right-hander and hits him on the pad, the movement would have taken the ball past leg stump
RP is still bowling too much on leg stump, Akmal missed out on the flick and got hit once again on the pad
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Butt waits on the back foot and cuts to Yuvraj at point
once again Butt drives firmly but can't beat the infield, RP pitched it slightly shorter and Butt walked into the cover drive and hit it to Uthappa at cover
defended on the back foot towards the leg side

excellent delivery, RP's best of the day, it pitched on the perfect length on off stump and seamed away from the left-hander off the pitch, Butt moved across his stumps, got squared up and the ball whizzed past his outside edge
a full ball swings back into Akmal after angling across him, Pathan nearly found the blockhole with his first ball, Akmal defends towards the off side
Pathan strays on to the pads this time but Akmal once again misses the flick and gets hit on the pad
Pathan pitches on middle and off stump and slants the ball across the right-hander, Akmal thinks about playing at it but decides to let it go
good length delivery pitches on off stump and swings into the right-hander, Akmal defends off the back foot towards point
short of a length on middle and leg stump, the ball doesn't bounce much and Akmal plays it off his hips towards square leg
fuller length outside the off stump from Pathan, Akmal reaches out for it and drives off the front foot to Yuvraj at point
excellent length around the off stump, RP didn't give the batsman any room on that occasion, Butt came forward and punched towards extra cover
Butt gets on to the front foot and plays a wristy drive through cover but Uthappa dives to his left and saves a boundary
short of a length delivery angles into the hips, Butt moves across his stumps and whips the ball towards midwicket
full and wide outside off stump, Butt reaches out for it and drives loosely, he gets an outside edge that runs down to third man, that's the first run off the bat in 17 balls

RP bowls it full outside the off stump and Akmal plays a curious shot,  he tried to drag it from outside off towards the leg side, the length wasn't short enough and Harbhajan does the fielding at square leg
good length delivery on off stump, Akmal gets on to the front foot and drives to cover
Pathan pitches just short of a length outside off stump, the ball sort of floats past Butt who decides to let it go through to Dhoni
Pathan got away with that, it was to far on leg stump and Butt flicked it straight to Harbhajan at midwicket, that's a boundary opportunity gone a begging
superb shot, Pathan was just a fraction short on off stump and Butt whipped it with his wrists and sent the ball racing between midwicket and mid-on for four, lovely timing
far too loose, Pathan offers Butt a half-volley on off stump, Butt comes forward and drives past mid-off for a second four, the pressure is easing off now
the slower delivery bowled full outside off stump, Butt waits on the back foot and chops it towards third man for a single
Pathan pitches on off stump and the ball straightens into Akmal who waits on the back foot and blocks
now how did that miss, it was full and angled into Butt who fell over as he tried to drive through the leg side, the ball swung away from the left-hander and just missed off stump
RP strays on to leg stump and hits Butt on the pad, Butt will feel that he missed out there
good length delivery outside off stump, Butt gets on to the front foot and lets it go
too full from RP Singh on middle stump, Butt leans forward and drives straight past the bowler for four more, this outfield is extremely quick
poor bowling and Butt dispatches the ball off his pads with a powerful flick through square leg, a few fielders give chase but their effort is futile
flicked from middle stump towards midwicket
Akmal moves across his stumps and tries to play a wild pull through midwicket, the ball was pitched outside off and it moved further away from the right-hander, Akmal wasn't close to making contact
full and wide outside off stump from Pathan, Akmal throws his bat at it, trying to play the big drive through cover, the ball flies off the outside edge down to third man
Pathan is a bit too straight to Butt, he flicks off the pads to square leg
a full ball swings into Akmal who gets forward and plays an inside-out cover drive to Uthappa at cover
Pathan adjusts his length and bowls a little short on off stump, Akmal sits on the back foot and plays the ball behind point
Akmal plays an airy drive to one that isn't that full, the ball falls a few feet in front of the fielder at mid-on
good length delivery pitches on off stump and angles into the left-hander, Butt defends on the back foot
good length once again outside off stump, Butt walks across his stumps, into the drive, and plays it towards cover
a touch fuller on off stump, Butt comes forward and punches firmly towards mid-off, Zaheer's not allowing room for the drive
played off the pads down to fine leg for a single
excellent length on off stump with a hint of movement into Akmal who waits in his crease and opens the face of the bat to play the ball towards point
a fraction short on middle stump, Akmal moves across in his crease and swings across the line to place the ball behind Harbhajan at square leg

Pathan strikes! The ball was pitched on leg and middle stump and it went straight through to Akmal who tried to pull, it was short and came slowly off the pitch, completely beating Akmal, he got hit on the pad in front of off and middle and Gould sends him on his way, replays show that the ball might have pitched outside leg stump ...
Pathan greets him with a bouncer over middle and leg stump, the umpire signals one for the over
Pathan pitches on middle stump, Younis comes forward and flicks towards square leg
this time Pathan pitches outside off stump and angles away from the right-hander, Younis lets it go
defended towards point off the back foot
played to point off the back foot once again
Butt comes forward and drives towards cover, he's unable to find the gap for Dhoni's packed the off-side field
short of a length on off stump, Butt defends back to Zaheer off the back foot
punched to mid-off on the front foot

what form Butt is in, that was just a  bit outside off stump and Butt made full use of it, the bottom hand came off the bat as Butt cut the ball hard into the ground and sent it racing to the point boundary
pushed off the pads towards mid-on
Butt waits on the back foot and guides the ball towards third man for a single
Butt moves across his stumps and pushes the ball towards the leg side
good length ball pitches outside off stump and angles into Butt who tries to drive straight, he gets an inside edge on to pad and collects a single behind point
Younis comes on to the front foot and drives away from his body towards point, Pathan is pitching the ball outside off and taking it away from the right-hander
a bit too straight from Pathan and Younis gets off the mark by forcing the ball off his hips towards mid-on
outstanding drive, Butt moves forward to a full delivery and sends the ball racing past Pathan with a wristy straight drive, the timing is impeccable and no one gives chase
not that full this time but Butt still drives past Pathan towards mid-on for a single
defended off the front foot back to Zaheer
good length ball outside off stump, Butt tries to drive through cover but gets cramped for room, he gets an inside edge towards the leg side
good length delivery outside off stump, Butt gets on to the front foot and drives to cover
Butt opens the face of the bat to play the ball towards Yuvraj at point
Butt waits until the last minute to open the face of the bat and run a ball that is angling into his off stump towards third man
fullish delivery on off stump, Younis comes forward and closes the bat of the bat to drive the ball towards mid-on
Butt moves across his stumps and flicks a good length ball from off stump towards square leg, very wristy shot
full ball outside off stump, Butt gets forward and drives towards cover where Uthappa dives to his left and parries the ball towards the left of the fielder at mid-off, the batsmen run a single
Younis walks forward and drives away from his body, the ball isn't full enough, however and he hits it to the fielder at cover
Younis once again tries to drive through cover off the front foot, the ball isn't coming on to the bat and he doesn't time it well
this time Younis opens the face of the bat and slices the ball towards point

RP Singh offers Younis a nice friendly full toss on off stump, it's ripe to be put away to the boundary and Younis dispatches it with a fierce off-drive, Gambhir dives full length to his right at mid-off to save the boundary
good length delivery on middle stump, Younis stays in his crease and defends back to Zaheer
the slower delivery bowled full on off stump, Younis defends towards cover on the front foot
Zaheer pitches on a good length on leg and middle, Younis leans across his stumps and pushes the ball to Harbhajan at midwicket

Younis gets on to the front foot, but is surprised by the short ball and tries to pull, he mis-hits it in the air but the ball falls just out of reach of Gambhir who runs from wide mid-on towards midwicket and puts in a full-length dive
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Zaheer finishes a tight over with a good length delivery on off stump, Younis comes forward and defends towards cover
RP Singh strays down leg side, wide called
a touch wide outside the off stump, Butt tries to drive through cover but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Butt moves across his stumps and pulls a good length ball between midwicket and mid-on, excellent placement and he's timed that very well even though he seemed to play it very gently
too straight from RP, Butt moves towards the off side and flicks down to fine leg where Kartik runs to his left and saves four
fullish length outside the off stump, Butt cuts it towards third man for  a single
the ball isn't that short and once again Younis tries to pull but mis-times it, he was late on the shot and wasn't in a good position to play it, he maybe trying to hit it a little too hard as well
Younis moves forward and times the drive well this time but hits it straight to cover
bowled flat outside off stump, angling across the left-hander, Butt drives off the back foot towards mid-off, Harbhajan dives full length to his right to cut it off
driven off the front foot towards cover
flighted delivery on middle stump, Butt comes on to the front foot and defends
a touch shorter this time outside off stump, Butt moves back and across and hits the ball through cover with a flat bat, he scampers through for two  and reaches his fifty, extremely well played

an awful mix-up and Butt has to go, Butt tried to close the face of the bat and play the ball on the leg side, he got a leading edge which rolled towards extra cover, Butt set off for the single but Younis sent him back, Yuvraj had moved quickly to his left from cover, picked the ball up with one hand and threw it back to Dhoni who broke the stumps with Butt well short, big wicket for India
flighted outside off and full, driven off the frontfoot to the covers
turn there! flighted on leg and turns away sharply, inside-out defensive stroke by Younis
flighted on leg, turned off the pads to the on side
perisists with the flight, this time on middle and leg, tries to work it to the on side
appeal! Younis goes well forward and defends, the ball straightend and strikes him in line with leg, replays showed the ball would have hit the stumps..well...
tucked to the on side
gets a big stride forward and pushes it just wide of gully to get a single
goes on the backfoot and plays with the turn, plays it uppishly towards midwicket
waits for the ball to cut back in and glances it just wide of leg slip
pushed in on middle and leg, gets across his stumps and works it with the turn to Yuvraj at square leg who dives full length to his right
worked just wide of midwicket for a single
flighted outside off, gets forward and pushes it towards point
full on middle and leg, worked past midwicket with the line
flighted on leg, gets forward and pushes it to the off side with the turn
tries to glance the ball fine but finds the short fine-leg fielder
goes on the backfoot and pushes it to the covers
pushed towards midwicket, can't find the gap there
defends back to the bowler
flighted on middle and off, turns into a full toss, pushed with ease past midwicket
pitches outside off stump and spins back into Yousuf who goes back in his crease and drives to cover, the shy at the non-striker's end concedes an overthrow
played off the pads behind square for a single
tossed up on middle stump, Younis moves towards the off and tries to flick, he gets beaten and the ball slips down leg side for Dhoni to collect
Younis tries to defend off the front foot and gets hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
Younis tries to sweep from outside off stump and gets a top edge towards short fine leg
Yousuf gets on to the front foot and nudges the ball towards midwicket
Younis tries to open the face of the bat and run the ball past slip, the ball falls just in front of of Ganguly who took the catch on the bounce
Younis tries to play the reverse sweep and gets hit on the pad, the impact was just outside the line of off stump and that's why the umpire didn't uphold Kartik's appeal
Kartik bowls the arm ball on middle stump, Younis backs away and cuts hastily towards point
driven towards m id-off for  a single
Younis tries to sweep once again and gets beaten by the arm ball, he got a large stride forward that time
Younis gets a long stride forward and defends
Younis moves across his stumps and paddles one in the air towards short fine leg
once again Younis tries to play the reverse sweep against the turn and gets hit on the pad, the ball goes off the pad to Ganguly at slip
Younis nudges one off his pads to midwicket for one
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
bowled flat and quick on middle and leg stump, Yousuf waits on the back foot and plays the ball to square leg
flighted delivery drifts into middle stump, Younis comes forward and drives inside out towards long-off, lovely running between the wickets and Younis gets two for it
driven inside out once again to cover
Younis gets down on one knee and sweep to Pathan at square leg
Younis tries to close the face of the bat and play the ball to midwicket, he gets squared up by the turn and gets a leading edge towards cover
defended on the front foot back towards the bowler
defended towards cover on the front foot
Yousuf moves a long way across his stumps and sweeps a flighted delivery to Gambhir at fine leg
Younis moves across his stumps this time and swings Harbhajan's flat delivery to deep backward square leg
played off the front foot towards short third man point, Dhoni runs across and fields
Yousuf leans forward and drives towards cover
Harbhajan bowls a flat delivery on middle stump, Yousuf moves forward and flicks off his pads towards square leg
Younis lunges forward and sweeps Kartik from off stump past the fielder at short fine leg, he's using that shot effectively
Kartik gives it a bit more air on middle stump, Yousuf leans forward and drives back to the bowler
swept to the fielder at short fine leg
Yousuf leans forward and opens the face of the bat to angle the ball to point

dropped, Yousuf tries to loft the ball across the line, he gets beaten by the turn across him and hits the ball with the toe end of the bat, the ball flies in the air in the direction of extra cover, Ganguly runs to his right, looking over his shoulder but he never got into position to catch it, he moved far too slowly and the ball fell just out of his reach, he barely got hands to that, a quicker fielder would have got to it easily
defended on the front foot
Younis gets forward and defends towards the leg side
pushed towards midwicket for  a single
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Yousuf comes down the track and defends once he realises that he isn't to the pitch of the ball
defended off the pads towards the leg side
Yousuf plays the reverse sweep towards short third man
Younis gets down on one knee and sweeps  a fast delivery from off stump to short fine leg
Younis comes forward and drives a full ball straight down the ground with mid-on in the circle, Gambhir ran around from long-off and picked it up with one hand just inside the boundary
Younis comes forward, waits for a short delivery to reach him and pulls to deep midwicket for two more to bring up the hundred for Pakistan
played behind square on the leg side for a single
Yousuf gets on to the front foot and drives, he gets beaten by the turn and hits it uppishly to Ganguly at cover, this time the ball fell well short of him
defended towards the off side
Younis moves towards the off side and tries to nudge it towards the leg, he misses and gets hit on the pad
once again he moves towards the off and nudges it the ball towards short fine leg
played towards short fine leg once again for a single
tight line and length from Harbhajan, Younis gets forward and blocks

caught in the deep! Younis comes down the track and tries to clear the long-on boundary, he didn't time it well enough and hit it straight to Pathan on the boundary who takes a simple catch, Younis falls at a crucial time
he gets off the mark by playing one towards short third man for a single
flighted delivery on off stump, Afridi strides forward and blocks
Afridi gets down on one knee and tries to slog across the line, he gets a top edge that falls in the no-man's land between midwicket and deep midwicket
he hits against the spin once again and mis-times the shot into the vacant deep midwicket region, a fielder goes there now
Afridi tries to sweep against the spin but misses
Afridi comes forward and opens the face to play the ball towards backward point
defended with an open face off the front foot towards first slip
swept past the fielder at short fine leg for a a single towards deep backward square leg
Afridi gets down on one knee and sweeps to short fine leg
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Harbhajan bowls a flat ball down leg side, wide called
bowled full and flat outside off stump, Afridi whips it using his wrists to midwicket
bowled flat and wide outside off stump, Afridi doesn't move his feet as he reaches out for it and cuts to third man
Yousuf waits in his crease and plays the ball late towards third man, RP Singh dived over the ball at short third man, he should have cut that off
flicked off the pads towards midwicket
once again Yousuf opens the face of the bat really late and plays the ball straight to RP Singh, Afridi calls for the single
Afridi tries to slog-sweep but gets beaten by the turn across him
defended on the back foot back towards Kartik
played off the pads through midwicket

Yousuf opens the face of the bat and runs the ball through backward point, there was a slight mix-up  as the backward point fielder made an attempt to field the ball but they eventually ran the single
slower ball at 114 kmh outside off stump, Afridi opens the face and guides the ball to third man
Pathan strays on to leg stump, Yousuf nudges the ball off his pads to fine leg for a single
Pathan finds the blockhole on middle stump, Afridi comes forward and digs the ball out back to the bowler
full ball on off stump, Afridi mis-times the cover drive to Kartik at cover but manages to sprint through for the single
that was extremely wide down leg side, Dhoni does well to move to his left and take it cleanly
good length ball on leg and middle stump, Yousuf closes the face of the bat and plays the ball behind square for a single
he begins with a half-volley outside off stump, Yousuf drives off the front foot through cover

what a shot that is, Afridi stands on the front foot and pulls the ball over the long-on boundary, that wasn't that short from Zaheer but was dispatched with a lot of power, the first six of the innings
driven of the front foot for a single to long-off
played off the pads down to fine leg for a single

good length ball on off stump, Afridi drives into the covers and calls for the single, Kartik picks up and hits the stumps direct at the batsman's end but Yousuf was safe, the umpires call for the third umpire who has a simple not-out decision to make
Zaheer pitches outside leg stump and angles it into leg and middle, Yousuf works the ball off his pads for a single behind square
short of a length outside off stump, Yousuf plays the square drive through point
slower ball on off stump, Afridi punches off the back foot towards the off side
played with an open face of the bat towards backward point
too short from Pathan on leg stump, Yousuf has plenty of time to get into position and pull the ball behind square leg for four
fuller ball outside off stump, it was the slower ball and it beat the outside edge of Yousuf's off-drive
full delivery outside off stump, Yousuf drives hard at it and gets an outside edge that runs to the third-man boundary, not very convincing but Pakistan will take it
Afridi gets his front foot out of the way and lofts down the ground, the ball reaches the fielder on the bounce
Yousuf sweeps to short fine leg
Yousuf moves towards the off and plays a paddle sweep towards short fine leg
Tendulkar pitches outside leg stump and goes down leg side, the umpire doesn't call it wide
Afridi comes down the track and hammers the ball back at Tendulkar who gets a hand on it, it was a bump ball
Tendulkar tosses the ball up on leg stump and spins it across Afridi who tries to drive and gets beaten
Kartik flights the ball into Yousuf who nudges the ball behind point for  a single
cut off the back foot towards deep point for  a single
flighted delivery on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot
flighted delivery on leg stump, flicked off the pads through square leg for a quickly-run double
guided through backward point with an open face for a single
Afridi charges down the track and takes Kartik on the full, he doesn't get under it, however, and drives to long-off for a single

Afridi charges down and backs away towards leg to makes room, Tendulkar sees him coming and bowls it wide outside off stump, Afridi lunges out at it and hits the ball with the toe end of the bat and gets two through point
this time he makes room and hits inside out over extra cover, the ball bounces once before going over the boundary, he was looking to hit straighter but still managed to time it well
swept to deep backward square for a single
full toss on leg stump, Yousuf gently pushes the ball to long-on for a single

stumped! Afridi tries to charge Tendulkar and make room to hit over the off side by backing towards leg, Tendulkar once again sees him coming and bowls it quicker and outside off stump, the ball spins away from Afridi, beats the outside edge of his bat and Dhoni whips off the bails with Afridi stranded
Tendulkar lobs a full toss on leg stump, Malik gets off the mark by driving to long-on
Kartik begins his final over with an arm ball on off and middle, Malik defends on the back foot
another arm ball on off stump, this time Malik defends on the front foot
Malik tries to flick through the leg side but gets hit on the pad
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Malik leans forward and drives a well-flighted delivery to long-on
Yousuf tries to close the face of the bat and play the ball through midwicket, he gets a leading edge towards cover
defended on the front foot towards cover

caught in the deep! Tendulkar bowls a nice juicy full toss which really should have been dispatched over the boundary, instead Malik gets his front foot out of the way and pulls the ball straight to Gambhir on the deep midwicket boundary, Tendulkar gets lucky with a loose ball
flighted delivery pitches outside leg stump and angles into Misbah who gets off the mark by nudging to short fine leg
tossed up outside leg stump, Yousuf paddle-sweeps to short fine leg for a single
defended off the front foot towards the off side
Misbah gets a single off the final ball by nudging the ball off his pads behind square
full toss on middle stump, Misbah walks towards the off side and pushes it into the gap at deep square leg, there was two for the taking but Yousuf was too slow
Yousuf leans forward and pushes to short fine leg for  a single
defended on the front foot to the leg side, Harbhajan  is bowling them quick and flat
Misbah goes on the back foot and cuts to cut against the spin
Misbah moves towards the off side trying to work the ball towards leg, it was the doosra from Harbhajan and Misbah had to defend after getting cramped for space
played off the pads towards square leg for a single, excellent over from Harbhajan
tossed up outside the leg stump, Misbah gets down on one knee and sweeps through square leg
Yousuf sweeps this time but straight to the man at short fine leg
that was a short short wide outside leg stump, Yousuf should have hit that to the fine leg boundary but missed
played through midwicket for  a single
faster ball on middle and off stump, driven through covers for a single
Yousuf tries to sweep against the spin but misses it, he gets a single to short third man
tossed up on off stump, Misbah drives off the front foot to long-off for a single
low full toss on off stump, Misbah comes forward and drives through midwicket for a single
bowled quicker through th air on off stump, Yousuf gets forward and blocks, he needs to get a move on
Yousuf gets down on one knee and tries to reverse sweep, he hits it to the fielder at short third man
Misbah flicks it off the pads for a single behind square
Yousuf goes on the back foot and flicks the ball towards midwicket
bowled quicker through the air on off stump, Misbah moves back and across and defends
Tendulkar bowls a flat ball on leg stump, Yousuf flicks through midwicket for the single

Misbah plays the reverse sweep and connects well, he's taken that from leg stump and placed it in front of the fielder at short third man, there's no one in the deep and that's a welcome boundary for Pakistan
flighted delivery on off stump, Misbah drives firmly down the ground to Uthappa at long-off
Yousuf plays the fine paddle sweep towards Pathan at short fine leg, the ball bounces before Pathan, spins to the right and beats Pathan, the ball races to the third man boundary
played off the pads through square leg for a single, Yousuf brings up his fifty, it's been a curious innings, he hasn't dominated at any stage but he's stuck it out and got the runs
pushed gently off the pads through square leg for two more to end the over, a good one for Pakistan for 13 runs have come off it
full delivery on off stump, Yousuf comes forward and drives through cover
good length delivery on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover, the batsmen run a quick single to Tendulkar who throws at the bowler's end and hits Misbah on the leg
Yousuf tries to flick but gets a top edge that falls safely between midwicket and mid-on
driven on the up through cover, he's placed that well enough to run two runs and bring up Pakistan's 200
Yousuf moves across his stumps and plays a fine paddle-sweep to the right of the fielder at short fine leg, once it beats him there's no stopping it
Yousuf makes room and cuts to the fielder on the point boundary, he gets the single and will retain strike
full and wide outside off stump, Yousuf drives to Zaheer on the cover-point boundary who fumbles and allows the batsmen to run the double
driven through covers once again for a single
full delivery outside the off stump, Misbah plays the ball towards extra cover for a single
RP bowls it full outside off stump, Yousuf moves towards the off side and drives towards Yuvraj at point
superb shot, Yousuf makes room by moving towards leg stump and lofts the ball over extra cover for four, he's getting a move on now, that was a lovely crisp strike
Yousuf walks down the pitch to a good length ball and opens the face to run the ball to third man
Yousuf waits on the back foot and guides the ball towards third man
full delivery outside the off sump, driven off the front foot towards cover
short of a length angling into the right-hander from round the wicket, Yousuf flicks off his hips for a single
Misbah opens the face of the bat and plays through point
full toss on off stump, Yousuf moves across in his crease and flicks the ball to Kartik at midwicket
another full toss angling into the right-hander's middle stump, Misbah drives to Pathan at long-on who once again fumbles to allow the second run, poor effort in the field
full ball outside the off stump, bearly in the block-hole, Yousuf makes room and runs the ball towards third man
Misbah tries to drive through cover but gets a thick outside edge to third man
poor line and length, the full toss on middle and leg stump, Yousuf moves towards the off and paddles it past the fielder at short fine leg for another boudnary
RP Singh bangs it short outside off stump, Yousuf plays it down to third man for  a single
Misbah takes advantage of a fullish delivery and smashes the ball through extra cover for four, he hit that very hard and long-off fielder didn't have a hope
a good-length delivery angles into Misbah, cramping him for room, Misbah tries to run it towards third man and gets an inside edge which bounces near his stumps
begins with a high full toss which Yousuf flicks through midwicket for just the single

caught! Misbah tries to hit Zaheer over the straight boundary, he clears his front foot out of the way to make room and lofts it, he hasn't timed it well and Harbhajan runs to his right from long-off and takes a well-judged catch on the run
Yousuf runs the ball down to third man for a single
Zaheer was looking for the yorker and bowls a low full toss which hits Rehman on the pad, that was missing leg stump, they run a leg bye towards cover
superb placement, Yousuf moves towards the off side and chips a slower ball over the head of the fielder at short fine leg for another boundary, he's scored plenty in that region today

Yousuf tries to run the final ball down to third man, Zaheer kept it full and outside off stump, he got an edge that went to Dhoni on the bounce, Rehman called Yousuf through for the single, as he should have because it is the final ball of the innings, Dhoni whipped off his glove and hit the stumps direct at the batsman's end with Rehman short of his crease

inn2.comm: 143.5 kmh straight away, Shoaib pitches on a good length outside off stump, it didn't bounce much which allowed Ganguly to push it off the back foot towards cover
Shoaib bowls it short and wide at 90 mph, Ganguly chases it and cuts in the air over point for the first boundary of the innings
pitches on a good length and angles into Ganguly's hips, Ganguly moves back and tucks it behind square
banged in short outside the off stump, this time Ganguly reaches out for it and plays it down into the ground to the right of the fielder at point, that was150 kmh
150 kmh once again but the direction is poor, Shoaib strays down leg side and the umpire signals wide
the slower ball, the speed gun records it at 117 kmh, Tendulkar moves across and flicks it uppishly from middle stump towards square leg
150.3 kmh, Shoaib digs it in short and gets it to bounce in Tendulkar's ribs, Tendulkar stays on the back foot and fends the ball towards the leg side
on target right away, on a good length on off and middle stump, Ganguly plays it towards mid-on
good length delivery pitches on off stump and angles across the left-hander, Ganguly waits on the back foot and drives to cover
excellent line and length, on middle stump, not giving the batsman any room, Ganguly defends back towards the bowler

loud appeal for leg before, Gul raps Ganguly on the pads as he moves across his stumps and tries to flick, the ball hits the pads and runs down to the third man boundary, that just pitched outside leg stump, a hair's breadth towards the right and Ganguly was a goner
defended back towards the bowler on the front foot
good length delivery on off stump, Ganguly pushes it off the back foot towards cover, Gul begins with a maiden over

streaky shot from Tendulkar, he was hurried by Shoaib's pace and tried to close the face of the bat and play the ball on the leg side, the outside edge flew through gully and raced to the third man boundary, Shoaib is working up some serious pace
fuller delivery on off and middle stump, Tendulkar flicks but straight to the man at square leg
pushed off the back foot towards cover
banged in short on middle stump, Tendulkar was once again late on the shot and  his pull fell short of the fielder at square leg

lbw! The slower ball has Tendulkar beaten, he moved across his stumps and tried to flick through the leg side, he missed and was hit on the knee roll in front of the stumps, the umpire took his time but eventually sent Tendulkar on his way, that was pretty plumb
he gets one at a friendly pace first up, that was just 150.3 kmh on middle and off stump, Gambhir gets on to the front foot and defends
Gul pitches on a good length outside off stump, Ganguly tries to cut but gets an inside edge

Ganguly is lucky there, he once again tried to play through the off side, playing away from the body when he didn't have enough room, the inside edge runs past his stumps and goes to the fine-leg boundary
defended on the back foot back towards the bowler
again Ganguly tries to drive through covers but once again he mis-times it, the inside edge rolls back towards Gul
this time he stays on the back foot and cuts one from outside off towards point
this one kept a little low after pitching on a good length on leg and middle stump, Ganguly went back in his crease to defend it on the leg side
93.7 mph, Gambhir moves forward to one that is on a good length outside off and opens the face of the bat to play the ball to point
that was the slower ball, 116.7 kmh, Gambhir spotted it and dispatched the half-volley from off stump between extra cover and  mid-off for four, lovely timing
Gambhir waits on the back foot and pushes the ball towards point where a fumble allows the single
banged in short outside off stump, angling into Ganguly who gets on top of the bounce and guides the ball towards third man
short of a length outside off stump, Gambhir times the cover drive supremely off the front foot to Afridi who mis-fields, the batsmen capitalise and take two when there should have been none
too full outside the off stump, Gambhir once again unleashes a fierce cover drive to Afridi who manages to stop it this time
short of a length outside off stump, Ganguly has a bit of room to work with and he cuts through backward point for a boundary
good length delivery once again but this time it's on middle and off stump, Ganguly waits on the back foot and defends towards mid-off
fuller ball on off stump, Ganguly moves forward and drives to Misbah who has been placed at short cover
Gul sends down a slower ball on middle stump, 125kmh that was, Ganguly comes forward and defends
Ganguly moves his front foot out of the way and tries to slog Gul over midwicket, he mis-times the shot and gets an inside edge to Akmal, that nearly bowled him
Gul bowls a shorter length down leg side, Ganguly tries to pull but misses, the umpire calls it wide
that was quick from Gul, nearly 138 kmh, on a good length outside off stump, Ganguly cuts but gets a bottom edge to the wicketkeeper

dropped, by either Akmal or Younis, Gambhir pushed tentatively away from his body at a good length delivery outside off stump and got a regulation edge that flew between the wicketkeeper and first slip, neither Akmal or Younis moved an inch

dropped again, by Younis this time, another regulation edge flew through to Younis who couldn't get down in time, the ball bounced to his right and ran down to the third man boundary, costly misses from Pakistan
defended on the back foot towards the off side
banged in short from round the wicket, angling into the left-hander, Gambhir waits on the back foot and defends
147 kmh, on a good length, homing into off and middle stump, Gambhir waits for the ball and defends with a straight bat on the back foot
poor ball to end what could have been a fabulous over for Pakistan, Shoaib drifts on to the pads and Gambhir helps himself to four more by flicking through midwicket
on a good length outside off stump, Gul pitches it on off stump and slants it across the left-hander, Ganguly tries to cut without moving his feet and gets beaten
that was much closer to off stump and beat Ganguly for pace by the looks of it, the ball kept low as well and bounced in front of Akmal who failed to collect it, that one nearly shaved off stump
pushed off the front foot towards cover
another slower ball outside off stump, Ganguly lets it go through to Akmal and the ball bounces again before thudding into Akmal's pads
another slower one keeps very low outside off stump, Ganguly jabs down at it and  gets a bottom edge that bounces before reaching Akmal
Ganguly comes down the pitch, makes room for himself, and hits Gul through the line back over his head, he lofted that with a lovely swing of his bat and the ball sailed over the straight boundary
pitches outside off stump and skids through to Akmal after Gambhir tries to cut and gets beaten
fuller ball on off stump, angling away from Gambhir, he moves on to the front foot and drives to cover
driven off the back foot this time towards cover point, he's timing it well but not finding the gaps
this time he waits for it and opens the face of the bat late to guide the ball to third man
defended off the back foot towards the off side

short of a length outside off stump, Ganguly takes a step down the pitch, makes room, and lofts wide of the fielder at mid-off, he's placed that extremely well and once it's in the gap, the ball speeds to the extra-cover boundary
full and straight on off and middle stump, defended off the front foot back to the bowler
Gambhir tries to drive one off the back foot but the ball was far too close to the body for the shot, he gets an inside edge on to his thigh
short and wide outside off stump, a rare loose ball from Gul but Gambhir mis-timed the cut off the back foot to the fielder at point
good length delivery on off stump, angling away from the left-hander, Gambhir opens the face and plays the ball to Younis at gully
on a good length outside off stump, Gambhir strides forward and lets the ball go through to Akmal

he can! He pitches it on a good length outside off stump, the ball bounces a touch higher than the previous ones and goes through to the wicketkeeper after beating Gambhir's back-foot drive, replays show a faint noise as the ball passed the bat but no one appealed
Ganguly pushes a good length ball from off stump towards cover, he sets off for the single but Gambhir sends him back
fuller length outside off stump, Ganguly once again plays the ball towards cover
Ganguly makes room by moving towards leg and flays the ball towards cover where Afridi makes a fine stop, that was hit extremely hard and would have stung
good length on off stump, Gambhir defends off the back foot to gully
excellent line and length from Rao, keeping it on and around off stump, Gambhir plays it to Younis at gully
Gambhir tries to drive through cover but the outside edge flies to Younis' right at gully and down to third man for a single
Gul nips it back into Gambhir after pitching on off stump, Gambhir tries to defend on the off side but gets an inside edge towards leg
defended on the back foot towards point
super shot, Gul came round the wicket to angle the ball into Ganguly, who countered it by making room, and lofting straight back over the bowler's head for four
on a good length outside off stump, Ganguly stays on the back foot and defends towards point
Gul pitches on leg stump, Ganguly flicks the ball off his pads to square leg
good length delivery on off stump, Ganguly drops it with soft hands towards cover for a quick single
fullish and outside the off, eased through point with an angled bat
a bit too full and too straight, Gambhir whips this one wristily through midwicket, that's well timed and placed
down the pitch and slap, Ganguly walks down to a shortish ball and flat bats towards the bowler. That's not too well hit and Rao can pick up in his follow-through and have a shy at the stumps
full and wide, Ganguly takes this on the full and glides the ball down to third-man
very full and on the stumps, this one is just too good to resist for Gambhir who plants his foot down the pitch and cover-drives all along the ground to the boundary. That is a terrific shot!
another cover-drive, it's well struck but won't beat the fielder at cover

short of a good length and on the pads, flick played and missed, off the pads to the leg side, Ganguly kicks himself as fine-leg is up in the circle and there could have been four easy runs if he got bat to that
fullish and on the off, defended down to the off side, the batsmen think about a single but wisely decide against it as the fielder swoops in from cover
overpitched and on the pads, worked away down towards fine-leg for a single
low full-toss on the stumps, Ganguly sees that a bit late and is surprised, but manages to adjust and pat the ball to the leg side
short of a length and on the off, Ganguly lines up the length early and swivels and pulls. It beats the infield and there's no stopping this ball as it races to the midwicket fence
slower ball, full and outside the off, played down towards point with an angled bat
bowled flat on leg and middle stump, Gambhir comes forward and pushes towards mid-on
Afridi fires it down leg side, Ganguly sweeps fine but not fine enough to beat Yousuf at short fine leg
Gambhir gets to the pitch of the ball by using his feet and drives through midwicket
Afridi surprises Gambhir by bowling the off break, he defends on the off side

dropped, Ganguly tries to run the ball to third man and got a faint edge to Akmal, the ball hit the gloves and rolled towards third man, Gambhir came half-way down the pitch from the non-striker's end but was sent back by Ganguly, that's the third catch Pakistan have grassed
defended on the off side off the back foot
full delivery on off stump, Gambhir eases on to the front foot and drives to mid-off who is standing right on the edge of the 30-yard circle
Gambhir skips down the track and lofts Rao over the fielder at mid-on, he's used his feet superbly to get to the pitch of the ball
outstanding timing, Gambhir moves across his stumps, perfectly balanced, and flicks between mid-on and midwicket for another boundary
good length delivery on off stump, Gambhir defends off the front foot towards the off side
Gambhir comes on to the front foot and tries to play the ball on the off side, the thick outside edge runs down to third man
good length delivery on middle and off stump, Ganguly moves right back in his crease and plays the ball with soft hands to the left of point for a single
bowled flat and fast on leg and middle stump, Ganguly strides forward and defends
pushed off the back foot towards long-off for a single
Gambhir gets on to the front foot and drives through midwicket for one more
Afridi beats Ganguly with the offbreak outside the off stump, it spun away from the left-hander and beat his attempted cut

Ganguly is run out! He played the ball off the pads to short fine leg and wanted the single, Gambhir sent him back after seeing Butt get to the ball swiftly, the throw came in quickly to Akmal who broke the stumps, Ganguly showed no real urgency in getting back and replays find that his bat is on the line as the bails come off, Pakistan get the break through against the run of play

Afridi fires in a quick delivery outside off stump, Dhoni drives hard at it and gets an outside edge that flies wide of Younis at first slip, the ball speeds towards Gul at third man who muffs it and concedes a boundary, Afridi claps in mock applause
defended off the front foot back towards the bowler
bowled flat through the air on off stump, Gambhir moves across his stumps and defends
Gambhir moves towards the off and flicks towards midwicket
bowled on a tight line and length around off stump, Gambhir defends towards point
Gambhir gets beaten by the flight as he walk outside off stump and tries to hit on the leg side, he gets hit on the pad but outside the line of off stump
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
bowled quick through the air on off stump, Dhoni defends on the front foot
Dhoni leans forward and defends towards cover
Dhoni moves back in his crease and manages to force the ball towards mid-on for a single
Afridi pitches on leg stump and spins the off break across Gambhir who defends on the back foot
Gambhir tries to close the face of the bat against the spin of the googly and gets a top edge that falls just out of Afridi's reach in the silly mid-on region
defended on the front foot towards cover
full ball drifting into the pads, Dhoni comes forward, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives between midwicket and mid-on, he's timed it well enough to reach the boundary
defended on the front foot towards the off side
defended off the front foot back to the bowler
Dhoni gets a long stride in and defends a flat delivery towards the off side
far too short from Rehman outside off stump, Dhoni moves quickly on to the bat foot and drives powerfully through cover, there's a fielder on the sweeper boundary but Gul has no chance
driven back to the bowler off the front foot
defended off the front foot back to Afridi
tossed up on off stump, Gambhir gets on to the front foot and drives to long-off
flighted delivery on middle stump, Dhoni gets on to the front foot and blocks
bowled flat through the air on off stump, Dhoni comes forward and drives to deep cover
played off the pads to short fine leg

bowled him! Gambhir doesn't know what's happened! Afridi slips in the offbreak, pitching it outside leg stump, Gambhir moves across his stumps and tries to play it towards midwicket, he misses and the ball spins in to hit leg stump, huge wicket for Pakistan
Dhoni waits on the front foot and plays it late towards backward point
Dhoni waits on the back foot for a short ball but has to reach out for it once it spins away from him, he manages to chip it over the infield but it didn't look very comfortable

what a shot that is, Yuvraj backed away to make room and even though the ball spun into him he managed to drive it through cover, he merely pushed that but his timing is such that the ball sped to the boundary
that pitched outside off stump and spun a long way to finish down leg side
pushed off the front foot towards cover point for  a single
Dhoni waits on the back foot and plays the ball towards point with a wristy cut
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Afridi pitches the leg break on off and middle stump, Yuvraj gets on to the front foot and blocks
Yuvraj gets a long stride forward and defends to the off side
Dhoni pushes one off the front foot towards cover
driven off the front foot towards long-off for one more
Afridi drifts on to the pads and Yuvraj nudges it past the man at short fine leg
flighted delivery outside off stump, Dhoni gets forward and has to reach out for it to drive towards cover

Yuvraj moves far back in his crease and opens the face of the bat late, the ball spins back into him and Yuvraj runs it fine past Shoaib at short third man, Shoaib gives chase but the ball beats him, the momentum takes Shoaib over the boundary and he crashes into the advertising hoardings
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
defended with a close face towards the leg side
Yuvraj leans forward and blocks a flat delivery on middle and off stump
full ball outside off stump, Yuvraj drives off the front foot towards cover
Rehman strays on to middle and leg, Yuvraj comes forward and across and flicks through midwicket
Dhoni waits on the back foot and cuts towards point, Afridi is bowling it flat outside  the off stump
cut off the back foot through point this time
Afridi fires it quickly down leg side, the ball bounces of Akmal's pads and lobs up, Afridi thinks it has hit the bat
tossed up nicely outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to play the cover drive off the front foot but gets beaten by the turn across him
Afridi drops short outside off stump, Yuvraj gets on to the back foot and drives through cover point
defended on the front foot towards cover
Dhoni drives uppishly down to long-off for a single to end the over
starts off with a short ball on off and middle stump, Dhoni moves on to the back foot and drives down the ground
Malik over-steps, it's the first no-ball of the day and the crowd roar in anticipation of a free hit
Yuvraj comes down the track and tries to hit over midwicket, Malik fired it quickly towards leg stump and beat Yuvraj, Akmal failed to collect cleanly but it wouldn't have mattered anyway
Yuvraj lets one go close to off stump
Yuvraj gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps powerfully to the deep backward square leg boundary
defended on the front foot towards the off side
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
good stop at cover, Dhoni goes back and cuts with the turn
good length on middle, Dhoni goes back and turns it off his wrists to midwicket
gets forward and glides it down to short third-man
pushed past the covers for a single
flighted outside off and driven to the covers
tossed on middle, defended back to the bowler
flighted on off, gets forward and pushes to cover
the turn deceives Dhoni as the ball strikes him high on the back-pad
defended back to the bowler
flighted on middle, Dhoni tucks it to midwicket with the turn
pushed to midwicket again, good stop cuts down a single
flighted on leg, tucked to midwicket
short of a length outside the off stump, Yuvraj cuts off the back foot towards point
banged in short on leg and middle stump, Yuvraj jumps on to the back foot and dabs it down towards midwicket for a single
full ball with a hint of reverse swing into the right-hander, Dhoni comes forward and pushes the ball to midwicket

Shoaib bowls a short ball, trying to unsettle Dhoni with the bouncer, Dhoni gets on top of the ball and hooks it down to the fine-leg boundary, he was in control of that because he hit in straight into the ground
Dhoni tries to drive to the off side but gets an inside edge towards Yousuf at mid-on, Dhoni calls Yuvraj through for the quick single
short of a length outside off stump, Yuvraj gets on to the front foot and drives through covers, he's placed that wide of the fielder on the sweeper boundary and will come back for the second
tossed up on off stump, the ball spins into Dhoni who goes back and pushes through cover
bowled flat through the air on middle stump, defended on the front foot
played off the pads behind square for a single
Dhoni begins to come down the pitch but goes back once Malik bowls a flat delivery, Dhoni plays the ball through midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off stump, Yuvraj drives off the front foot to long-off
Dhoni goes on to the back foot, looking to play the ball to square leg, Malik bowls a flat ball that spins towards leg and strikes Dhoni on the pad
punched off the back foot through cover for a single
full ball swings into Dhoni from outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
pitches on a good length on off stump and angles into Dhoni who tries to work the ball through midwicket but gets hit on the thigh
Shoaib comes round the stumps and angles the ball into off stump, Yuvraj closes the face of the bat a tad too early and gets an outside edge through point
once again Yuvraj gets troubled by the angle into him and closes the bat too early, the edge rolls towards cover
defended off the back foot towards cover
flighted delivery pitches on off stump and spins into Dhoni who gets on the front foot and is hit on the pad
bowled flat into Yuvraj's middle stump, defended on the front foot
cut off the back foot to the left to the fielder at short fine leg
Yuvraj goes on the back foot and tries to hit through the off side, he tried to hit it a bit too hard and got a bottom edge
played off the pads through midwicket
Dhoni steps down the track, reaches out for a delivery outside off stump and smashes it with tremendous power to the long-on boundary
Yuvraj moves right across his stumps and plays the ball towards midwicket
Yuvraj flicks off his pads towards backward square
dropped, short ball on middle stump, Yuvraj doesn't get into position to play the pull but still manages to connect with some power, the ball flew low to Malik at midwicket who couldn't hold on
defended to the leg side off the back foot
Rehman bowls a flat delivery on leg stump, Yuvraj nudges the ball off his pads towards short fine leg
defended towards midwicket off the back foot
bowled flat through the air on middle stump, Dhoni backs away and hits it back to the bowler
flicked off the pads behind square for a single
flighted delivery outside of stump, Yuvraj tries to drive through cover but mis-hits it back to the bowler
Yuvraj opens the face of the bat late and picks off and easy single to Shoaib at short third man
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Afridi bowls full flat and fast into Dhoni's middle stump, he gets on to the front foot and defends towards the leg side
Yuvraj gets on to the front foot and gets hit on the pad for a leg bye towards cover
Dhoni moves back in his crease and defends towards the off side
gets on to the front foot and drives towards point, tight line from Rehman, around the off stump, the length is excellent too
Dhoni comes forward and drives towards long-on for one more
Yuvraj leans across his stumps and flicks towards Malik at midwicket
what power and placement, Yuvraj gets down on one knee and sweeps past the fielder at short fine leg for another boundary

Dhoni backs away, exposing all three stumps, and cuts towards Malik at cover, Dhoni calls for a quick single, Malik throws at the bowler's end but Afridi had broken the stumps before the ball reached him, Dhoni was home in any case
played off the pads towards short fine leg for one more
Dhoni once again makes room and gives Afridi view of all his stumps, he drives off the back foot to Malik at cover
cut off the back foot towards backward point
Yuvraj tries to cut off the back foot but the angle across him takes the ball past his outside edge
driven to long-off for  a single to end the over
bowled flat through the air on off and middle stump, Yuvraj defends off the back foot to midwicket
loud appeal for lbw, Yuvraj gets a long way across his stumps and tries to sweep, the umpire says not out, that might have clipped leg stump
defended on the front foot

Yuvraj uses his feet to come down the wicket and get to the pitch of the ball, once he's there he swings his bat with a high back lift and a full follow-through and sends the ball soaring over deep midwicket
defended on the back foot towards the off side
pushed towards cover off the back foot
Dhoni backs away and cuts through cover for a single
Afridi bowls a flat ball on off stump, Yuvraj waits on the back foot and cuts to backward point
Dhoni waits until the last moment before driving to point for  a single

Yuvraj dabs the ball towards cover for a single, he sets off for a run but Dhoni sends him back, Yuvraj slips as he turns around but manages to scramble back into his crease before the throw comes into Akmal
flicked off the pads behind square for  a single
Dhoni tries to cut a flat ball outside off stump without moving his feet much and gets beaten
Yuvraj tries to run one down to third man but gets beaten
Yuvraj gets down on one knee and sweeps Rehman in the air down to deep backward square leg

Dhoni steps down the track to Rehman who bowls a flatter and faster ball, he gets beaten in the flight and the ball hits the outside edge of the bat and flies through where first slip would have been for four more
defended on the front foot towards mid-off
Dhoni tries to hit the ball too hard through midwicket and mis-times the shot
this time he connects and pulls the ball through midwicket for a single
bowled short of a length on off stump, Dhoni defends off the back foot towards the bowler
fuller length on the pads, Dhoni flicks it through midwicket for a single
full length delivery angles across Yuvraj who gets on to the front foot and drives through cover
Dhoni pushes the ball towards midwicket and immediately calls Yuvraj through for the single
good length delivery pitches on middle and off and angles across Yuvraj who opens the face of the bat and plays the ball to backward point
good length ball on middle stump, Yuvraj gets on to the back foot and defends towards midwicket
cut off the back foot through cover point for  a single
Yuvraj goes on to the back foot and dispatches the long-hop with power over square leg, that was nicely placed
played with an open face towards short third man for  a single which brings up Yuvraj's fifty, it's been a timely innings for India
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
driven down the ground to  long-off for a single
Yuvraj waits for it late and cuts to the fielder at short third man
Dhoni too reaches fifty, with a drive through covers, it's his 17th ODI fifty and he's made a significant contribution to the run chase
Yuvraj comes forward to an over-pitched delivery and smashes the straight-drive past the bowler, Afridi is on the long-off boundary but he doesn't even move, that's how powerfully it was struck
played with an open face down to third man
driven down the ground for  a single

full delivery outside the off stump, Yuvraj eases on to the front foot and drives through cover, Afridi has to run a long way to his right to reach the ball, he gets there in time and stops the ball with his boot
Yuvraj plays another well-timed drive but this time straight to the fielder at cover
Dhoni nudges the ball off his pads for  a single behind square
Yuvraj latches on to a short ball and pulls it to deep backward square leg for a single, it brings up the 100-run stand between these two
dreadfully short and Dhoni rocks back and hammers the ball through midwicket for another boundary
pulled through midwicket to Butt in the deep for a single
full ball on middle stump, defended towards midwicket

caught in the deep! Yuvraj gets down on one knee and slog sweeps Rehman, looking to clear the deep backward square leg boundary, he got a bit of a top edge that flew straight to fine leg where Afridi takes an easy catch
Rao strays down leg side, Dhoni tries to run it down to fine leg but gets hit on the pad, Akmal collects and appeals for the caught behind
superbly timed, Dhoni comes on to the front foot and drives on the up through cover, mid-off runs quickly to his left and slides but the ball beats him comfortably and races to the boundary
driven back to the bowler on the front foot, Rao fumbles and allows the single
good length ball on off and middle stump, defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Uthappa gets off the mark by flicking a full toss off his pads towards long leg
Dhoni hardly moves his feet as he drives a good length delivery towards mid-off, the fielder is standing on the edge of the circle so there's an easy single on offer

and he strikes straight away! Shoaib pitches one on a good length outside off stump, Dhoni drives away from his body and gets a thick edge through to Akmal who takes the catch this time, it was flying at considerable speed and the light isn't the best so he did well to hold on to it
Shoaib gives Pathan a bouncer first up, he ducks under it but the ball dips and bounces a second time before reaching Akmal
short of a length ball on leg and middle stump, Pathan nudges the ball towards midwicket and calls for the single
that one kept low on off stump, Uthappa moves across towards the off side, pushes the ball towards midwicket and takes the single
Shoaib fires the yorker in on off stump, he grunts as he puts a lot of effort into that ball, Pathan jabs down on it and plays the ball towards point
short and wide outside the off stump, Pathan slashes at it and misses, that was pretty close to the bat but the umpire calls it wide
145.1 kmh, Shoaib angles the ball down leg side from round the wicket and concedes another wide
full ball on off and middle stump, Pathan pushes it off the front foot towards cover

huge appeal for lbw, Uthappa moves across his stumps and tries to close the face of the bat, the ball nips back into Uthappa and hits him on the top of the front pad, Rao thinks he has his man but the umpire says not out, that was very close, might have clipped the top of leg stump
driven down the ground to long off for a single
width offered outside off stump, Pathan frees his arms and drives off the front foot towards cover

streaky streaky, Pathan tries to cut one that's much too close to the body, the inside edge goes ever so close to his off stump and runs down to the fine-leg boundary, Akmal had no chance to stop that
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Pathan opens the face of the bat and plays the ball towards point
pitches on a good length on off stump and goes straight through, Uthappa tries to hit across the line but gets beaten

full ball at nearly 93 mph, Uthappa moves across the stumps and tries to hit through midwicket, the ball kept very low and beat the bat, how did that miss the stumps, it's almost as though Uthappa can't see it in the fading light
bowled full and fast in the block hole on off and middle stump, Uthappa comes forward and blocks
Uthappa moves forward and hits through the line of the ball, he's connected sweetly this time and lofts the ball back over Shoaib's head to get four of the six runs that India need
Shoaib replies with the bouncer outside off stump, Uthappa lets it go

that's the victory for India! Uthappa charges down the track and has a wild heave at a good length ball outside off stump, the top edge swirls high in the air and bounces once before going over the third-man boundary
